summary: New version of fantasy cities without DLC needed and 17 weapon come from "Forbidden Scroll" event (include 5 special shield)
descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone i glad you visit my mod (my english very bad).
Today i release my first weapon mod comebine with landscape mod call "Fantasy cities and Weapons".
This mod dont recommend DLC make you feel free when use it.
This mod contain special landscape with 19 weapons and 5 shield (small but useful) and 2 craft material you can use it as ingredients with good effect this 2 call "Sunlight Shard" and "Moonlight Shard" with exquisted shape check out forge for craft only weapons it easy ! 
Some weapon you can take or steal, some is craft only.
The location of those weapons you can find by yourself (Tip: follow the image i post)
List of weapon (Include shield)
    +Sins and Chaisten                    ( 1 handed blade )
    +Seas Rage                               ( 2 handed spear )
    +Justices                                  ( 2 handed greatsword )
    +Thorn                                     ( 2 handed greatsword )
    +Sunrays                                   ( 1 handed sword )
    +Dawn sun                                ( 2 handed greatsword )
    +Eclipes                                    ( 2 handed greatsword )
    +Full Moon                                ( 2 handed greatsword )
    +Moon Fangs                             ( 1 handed sword )
    +Spear of Dark                          ( 2 handed spear )
    +Spear of Light                         ( 2 handed spear )
    +Fallen Angel                            ( 2 handed scythe )
    +Golden Cross                          ( staff [stormcall])
    +Night Lotus                            ( staff [paralyze])
    +Wing of Victory                      ( 2 handed battle axe)
    +Heaven Despair                     ( 2 handed greatsword )
    +Reget                                    ( 1 handed sword )
    +Wind Hunter                          ( bow )(notice: dont drop the bow because it will disappear)
    +Flower Heart                          ( shield )
    +Angel Feathers                       ( shield )
    +Sun Charms                           ( shield )
    +Moon Claws                           ( shield )
    +Algendash                             ( shield )
The problem of fantasy cities previous version is too big and it is make other mod (especial is home) mod get trouble, but dont worry this mod is no matter with your house mod any more (except it is a floating house).
Those strange thing around a event call "Forbidden Scroll Crisis" i will update late with the short list about strange thing around Skyrim and previous master of there strange weapons.
Thank you for visit this mod i love you like it. enjoy the otherworldness !!!
This mod use skyrim mesh because i'm not expert 3D draw so i only use nifskope to make those weapon but hope you enjoys it.
author: congtuan999
